name: Skill Elude - Circle Spinner Shift & Boom Wave, Perfect Pop Game
name_original: Skill Elude - Circle Spinner Shift & Boom Wave, Perfect Pop Game
description:
Rush forward at high speed while eluding obstacles in the universe. Being a little triangle, your world is full of difficulties and unknowns.

Beneath its minimalist graphics and simple gameplay lies an equally clear goal: Hold and swipe to control, avoid obstacles and collect shields and bombs. Also, coins on the way will help you score high.

Seems easy? See how far you can go!

Awesome features:
- Minimalistic style
- Simple gameplay
- Play with friends in Game Center
